company_1.name: Eccube E-commerce System
company_1.description: This is an e-commerce website specializing in gift items tailored for Japan’s seasonal events and holidays. Includes several management subsystems: event management, data and logistics management, and an admin dashboard for website.
responsibility: Developed event management functionality including automated seasonal event rotation and image upload features for event banners and product galleries
Modified and customized EC-CUBE's default user interface templates to match detailed design specifications and requirements

company_1.name: Flyer Manager System
company_1.description: This is a web-based system that enables businesses to create, manage, and distribute promotional flyers. The platform supports flyer content design, manages flyers on a per-business basis, and allows online publishing
responsibility: Built and optimized interactive flyer editor interface using ReactJS, implementing drag-and-drop functionality and real-time preview features to enhance user experience
Collaborated with back-end developers to integrate RESTful APIs for flyer data management, image uploads, and template processing

company_1.name: LMS Compass School
company_1.description: LMS Compass School is an online learning management system for schools, supporting classroom, student, teacher, exam, and result management, as well as online testing.
responsibility: Developed multi-language switching functionality and handled database connections corresponding to selected languages using Golang
Develop and maintain user interfaces using NextJS. Write unit test for UI components and features using Jest

company_1.name: EC-PhotoAlbum
company_1.description: EC-PhotoAlbum is a website implemented in photo stores across Japan, allowing customers to easily create and order personalized photo albums.
responsibility: Developed and maintained back-end services for photo album creation, order processing, and customer management functionality.

company_1.name: Football Field Booking
company_1.description: Football Field Booking is a football field management and rental project. The system includes: user site and admin dashboard.
responsibility: Participated in developing football field management screens using VueJS.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for user authentication, field management, booking system, and payment processing

company_1.name: Search Solution
company_1.description: Search Solution is a system for managing products, search content, and questions and answers related to Sciseed’s platform.
responsibility: Develop new features.
Optimize performance and usability.

company_1.name: Sanyu - Kanbe
company_1.description: Sanyu is a student management system project for overseeing international students in Japan.
responsibility: Front-end development.
Develop new features.
Fix bugs and maintain existing features.

company_2.name: Enterprise Operating System
company_2.description: This is an internal enterprise management system designed for small and medium-sized companies, enabling the management of documents, human resources, tasks, leave, and more.
responsibility: Developed core modules including: Employee management, document management, task assignment module, attendance module, inventory module using PHP and MySQL

company_2.name: Dananggas
company_2.description: Dananggas is a corporate website introducing Anh Buu Company, which specializes in supplying and distributing gas products.
responsibility: Designed and developed complete corporate website including homepage, product catalog, service pages, photo gallery, guidance section, and contact forms using PHP, HTML5, and Bootstrap framework.
Implemented responsive design and SEO optimization with Google Maps integration, mobile-friendly interface.

company_2.name: EEScons
company_2.description: EEScons is a corporate website introducing EEScons Company, a construction business.
responsibility: Designed and developed website including homepage, about, services portfolio, project gallery, company profile, and contact pages using PHP, HTML5, and Bootstrap framework with custom responsive templates
Implemented performance optimization and SEO optimization to ensure reliable website operation and improved search visibility

company_2.name: DanavtcSurvey
company_2.description: DanavtcSurvey is the survey management system of Danang Vocational College.
responsibility: Developed survey management backend system including survey creation tools, response collection mechanisms, user authentication, and administrative dashboard using PHP and MySQL with responsive HTML5/Bootstrap frontend interfaces.
Implemented system maintenance and feature enhancements including bug resolution, security updates
